ZDO_BindReq_t ZDO_MgmtBindResp_t::bindingTableList[ZDP_BINDING_TABLE_LIST_SIZE]

A list of descriptors, beginning with the StartIndex element and continuing for BindingTableListCount, of the elements in the Remote Device's Binding Table.
